issue.title: [C++] Missing ending quote in thirdpartyversions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14220](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14220). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This change/line has a missing quote at the end, leading to failures for builds that reference this
https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/2a6f78b4feaf168444be64892219fb4e44f34369#diff-39a645630afbfb1702af73bcb3fcdb13d87be3d78fcf501f2dcf93000f4aa738R107

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14220?focusedCommentId=17424493) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11319
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11319>
